data.title: Some Descendants of the FRANCE Family Related to George Washington 1st US President
data.text:
Some Descendants of

Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE FRANCE,

Seigneur de Montfort

(920 - 983)

Click HERE to See how George Washington 1st US President's Family are Related to this Person.

(Persons with names shown in Green are Direct Ancestors of George Washington 1st US President)

(Persons with names in RED are Especially Notable Direct Ancestors of George Washington 1st US President).

Copyright 2007 by Terry J. Booth. All reproduction or reuse is prohibited, in whole or in part, without written permission of the author.

The author has relied much on those herein cited. Please contact the author about an important source not cited or improperly cited.

First Generation

1. Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE FRANCE Seigneur de Montfort (See Link for Ancestry),1534 1728 son of Robert I DE FRANCE King of West Francia [922-923] and Beatrix DE FRANCE NOT Dau of Herbert I DE VERMANDOIS, was born Abt 0920 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France 1534 and died in 0983 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France.1534 Another name for Amaury was Amaury I DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort. Amaury married Judith DE CAMBRAI in 0952.1534 1728 Judith was born Abt 0940 in Cambrai, Nord-Pas-de-Calais, France.

The Child from this marriage was:

2. i. Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE FRANCE was born Abt 0960 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France 68 and died about 1018 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France.68

Second Generation

2. Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE FRANCE (Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born Abt 0960 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France 68 and died about 1018 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France.68 Another name for Guillaume was Guillaume DE MONTFORT.68 Guillaume married Daughter of Rotrou DE NOGENT 68 Cir 0995.68 Daughter was born Cir 0975 in Nogent-le-Roi, Eure-et-Loire, Beauce/Centre, France 68 and died of Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France.

The Child from this marriage was:

3. i. Amaury II DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort 1534 1728 1729 1730 was born circa 1000 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 1534 and died after 4 Feb 1053.1534 1728 1729

Third Generation

3. Amaury II DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort 1534 1728 1729 1730 (Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born circa 1000 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 1534 and died after 4 Feb 1053.1534 1728 1729 Amaury married Bertrade (Berteis) DE GOMETZ 1534 1730 in 1028 in Ile de France, France.1534 Bertrade was born circa 1010 in Gometz, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died after 1053.1728

Children from this marriage were:

4. i. Simon I DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort 1534 1731 1732 1733 1734 was born circa 1030 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France,1534 died circa 1087 of Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 1535 1734 at age 57, and was buried in Epernon, Eure-et-Loire, Beauce/Centre, France.

5. ii. Eva DE MONTFORT 1534 was born circa 1045 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France.

Fourth Generation

4. Simon I DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort 1534 1731 1732 1733 1734 (Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born circa 1030 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France,1534 died circa 1087 of Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 1535 1734 at age 57, and was buried in Epernon, Eure-et-Loire, Beauce/Centre, France. Simon married Isabella DE BROYES Dame de Nogent 1668 1734 about 1055.1668 1734 Isabella was born circa 1034 in Broyes, Marne, Champagne, France and died after 1058 in Nogent-le-Roi, Eure-et-Loire, Beauce/Centre, France. Other names for Isabella were Isabella de Broyes Dame de NOGENT, and Isabel de BROZES Dame de Nogent-le-Roi.1733 1734

Children from this marriage were:

6. i. Amaury III DE MONTFORT Segineur de Montfort 1735 was born circa 1051 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 1735 and died circa 1089 in Killed invading lands of William Breteuil 1735 at age 38.

7. ii. Elizabeth (Isabel) DE MONTFORT 607 1666 1668 1669 was born circa 1058 in Montfort-l'Amaury Castle, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died after 1102 in as a nun.1669

Simon next married Agnes 'd'Evreux' DE NORMANDY (See Link for Ancestry), daughter of Richard 'd'Evreux' DE NORMANDY Comte d'Evreux and Godheut DE (TOENI)(EVREUX) UNKNOWN, circa 1064.1534 1728 1734 Agnes was born about 1040 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France 1534 and died of Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France. Another name for Agnes was Agnes D' EVREUX.1534 1535 1728 1734

Children from this marriage were:

8. i. Richard DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort 1735 was born circa 1065 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France, died in 1092 in Killed in attack on Abbey at Conches 1735 at age 27, and was buried in Epernon, Eure-et-Loire, Beauce/Centre, France.

9. ii. Simon II DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort 1735 was born about 1067 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died after 1101.1735

10. iii. Amaury IV DE MONTFORT Count d'Evreux 1534 1677 1728 1736 was born circa 1070 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France, died 19 Apr 1137 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France 1534 1728 at age 67, and was buried in Haute-Bruyere Abbey near Montfort-l'Amaury, France.

11. iv. Bertrade 'Beatrice' DE MONTFORT 795 1532 1535 was born circa 1073 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died 14 Feb 1117 in Fontevrauld l'Abbaye, Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France 1535 at age 44.

Fifth Generation

7. Elizabeth (Isabel) DE MONTFORT 607 1666 1668 1669 (Simon I DE Seigneur de Montfort 4, Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born circa 1058 in Montfort-l'Amaury Castle, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died after 1102 in as a nun.1669 Elizabeth married Ralph III DE TOENI (See Link for Ancestry),1666 1667 son of Roger II 'the Spaniard' Conches DE TOENI and Godheut DE (TOENI)(EVREUX) UNKNOWN, about 1076 in Ile de France, France. Ralph was born circa 1030 in Conches, Eure, Normandy, France 607 1667 and died 24 Mar 1102 in Flamstead, Hertfordshire, England 607 1667 at age 72. Another name for Ralph was Ralph de CONCHES. See the Ralph III DE TOENI Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

10. Amaury IV DE MONTFORT Count d'Evreux 1534 1677 1728 1736 (Simon I DE Seigneur de Montfort 4, Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born circa 1070 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France, died 19 Apr 1137 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France 1534 1728 at age 67, and was buried in Haute-Bruyere Abbey near Montfort-l'Amaury, France. Amaury married Agnes DE GARLANDE (See Link for Ancestry), daughter of Anselme DE GARLANDE and Daughter of Guy DE ROCHEFORT-EN-YEVLINES, about 1120.1736 Agnes was born circa 1100 in Rochefort-en-Yevlines, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died about 1143 in Gournay-sur-Marne, Seine-et-Marne, Ile-de-France, France about age 43.

Children from this marriage were:

12. i. Simon DE MONTFORT Comte D'Evreux was born about 1123 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France, died 13 Mar 1181 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France about age 58, and was buried in Evreux Cathedral, Normandy, France.

13. ii. Agnes DE MONTFORT Heiress of Gournay 2 68 was born about 1124 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 68 and died 15 Dec 1181 in Gournay-sur-Marne, Seine-et-Marne, Ile-de-France, France 2 68 about age 57.

11. Bertrade 'Beatrice' DE MONTFORT 795 1532 1535 (Simon I DE Seigneur de Montfort 4, Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born circa 1073 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died 14 Feb 1117 in Fontevrauld l'Abbaye, Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France 1535 at age 44. Bertrade married Foulques IV 'le Rechin' D' ANJOU Comte d'Anjou (See Link for Ancestry),795 1721 son of Geoffroy II 'Ferreol' DE GATINAIS Comte de Gatinais [1028-1046] and Ermengarde D' ANJOU, circa 1090 after annulment of his 3rd marriage.795 1535 Foulques was born circa 1045 in Gatinais, Loiret, Orleanais Centre, France 1535 and died 14 Apr 1109 of Anjou, Pays-de-la-Loire, France 1535 at age 64. Another name for Foulques was Foulques IV 'le Rechin' DE GATINAIS. See the Foulques IV 'le Rechin' D' ANJOU Comte d'Anjou Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

Bertrade next married Phillip I 'the Fair' CAPET King of France [1060-1108] (See Link for Ancestry) [1060-1108], son of Henry I 'Capet' DE FRANCE King of France [1031-1060] and Agnesa Yaroslavna 'Anna' Of KIEV, in 1093 in Scandalous--Bertrada was married to another.1532 1534 Phillip was born before 23 May 1052 in Reims, Marne, Champagne, France,584 1532 died 29 Jul 1108 in Meulan, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France,584 1444 1532 1533 and was buried in Abbaye St-Benoit-sur-Loire, Loiret, Orleanais/Centre, France. Another name for Phillip was Philip I "The Fair" DE FRANCE.584 1444 1532 1533

See the Phillip I 'the Fair' CAPET King of France [1060-1108] Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

Sixth Generation

12. Simon DE MONTFORT Comte D'Evreux (Amaury IV DE Count d'Evreux 5, Simon I DE Seigneur de Montfort 4, Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born about 1123 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France, died 13 Mar 1181 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France about age 58, and was buried in Evreux Cathedral, Normandy, France. Simon married Maud DE (MONTFORT) UNKNOWN circa 1145 in Prob France. Maud was born circa 1125 and died about 1168 of Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France about age 43.

The Child from this marriage was:

14. i. Bertrade DE MONTFORT 1307 1323 1324 was born in 1155 in Montfort-Sur-Risle, Eure, Normandy, France and died 12 Jul 1227 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France at age 72.

13. Agnes DE MONTFORT Heiress of Gournay 2 68 (Amaury IV DE Count d'Evreux 5, Simon I DE Seigneur de Montfort 4, Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born about 1124 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France 68 and died 15 Dec 1181 in Gournay-sur-Marne, Seine-et-Marne, Ile-de-France, France 2 68 about age 57. Agnes married Waleran de BEAUMONT Comte de Meulan, 1st Earl of Worcester (See Link for Ancestry),2 1677 1678 1679 son of Robert I DE BEAUMONT 1st Earl of Leicester and Isabel or Elizabeth 'de Vermandois' CAPET, about 1141.2 68 Waleran was born in 1104 in Beaumont-le-Roger, Eure, Normandy, France,2 1677 1679 died 10 Apr 1166 in Preaux, Eure, Normandy, France 2 1677 1679 at age 62, and was buried in Preaux Abbey, Eure, Normandy, France.2 See the Waleran de BEAUMONT Comte de Meulan, 1st Earl of Worcester Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

Seventh Generation

14. Bertrade DE MONTFORT 1307 1323 1324 (Simon DE Comte D'Evreux 6, Amaury IV DE Count d'Evreux 5, Simon I DE Seigneur de Montfort 4, Amaury II DE Seigneur de Montfort 3, Guillaume 'de Montfort' DE 2, Amaury I 'de Montfort' DE Seigneur de Montfort 1) was born in 1155 in Montfort-Sur-Risle, Eure, Normandy, France and died 12 Jul 1227 in Evreux, Eure, Normandy, France at age 72. Bertrade married Hugh 'de Kevelioc' DE GUERNON Earl of Chester (See Link for Ancestry), son of Ranulph DE GUERNON 2nd Earl Of Chester and Maud 'of Gloucester' FITZ ROBERT, in 1169 in Montfort-Sur-Risle, Eure, Normandy, France. Hugh was born in 1147 in Cyveiliog, Monmouthshire, Wales, died 30 Jun 1181 in Leeke, Straffordshire, England at age 34, and was buried in St. Werburgh's Abbey, Chestershire, England. Another name for Hugh was Hugh DE KEVELIOC.1307 1320 1321 1322

See the Hugh 'de Kevelioc' DE GUERNON Earl of Chester Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.
